name: Vigilant
long_description: Vigilant is a lightweight observability tool that helps developers at startups track what's happening in their application. You send us data like logs, and metrics, and errors. Then from our dashboard, you can search, graph, and create alerts on your data. We're a team of builders with relentless focus on polished design and engineering excellence.
one_liner: Lightweight logging, metrics, and error monitoring for startups
